00040 void RequestHandlerLoadRange::run() {
00041   ResponseCallback cb(m_comm, m_event_ptr);
00042   TableIdentifier table;
00043   RangeSpec range;
00044   RangeState range_state;
00045   const char *transfer_log_dir;
00046   const uint8_t *decode_ptr = m_event_ptr->payload;
00047   size_t decode_remain = m_event_ptr->payload_len;
00048 
00049   try {
00050     table.decode(&decode_ptr, &decode_remain);
00051     range.decode(&decode_ptr, &decode_remain);
00052     transfer_log_dir = decode_str16(&decode_ptr, &decode_remain);
00053     range_state.decode(&decode_ptr, &decode_remain);
00054 
00055     m_range_server->load_range(&cb, &table, &range, transfer_log_dir,
00056                                &range_state);
00057   }
00058   catch (Exception &e) {
00059     HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00060     cb.error(Error::PROTOCOL_ERROR, "Error handling LoadRange message");
00061   }
00062 }
